editorialNotes.standard: This blockbuster runner keeps charging ahead with loads of rewards to chase and special events set in cities across the world.

It took less than a minute for us to get hooked on this series all over again. The sequel to Rovio’s blockbuster puzzler polishes the feathery fun to a golden sheen—and with more than just beautiful new graphics. Features like multi-stage levels, pig-punishing spells and choosing the order in which you fling birds make the game more irresistible than ever. Whether it’s your first Angry Birds game or your 10th, you’ll be flying high in no time.

ios.subtitle: Race and drive uphill to win!

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.short: A huge range of cars and tons of tracks. Get stuck in!

editorialNotes.standard: It's back! Sprint for the leaderboards in the sequel to one of the App Store's most popular endless runners, which arrives with a host of fabulous improvements, from overhauled graphics to refined controls, original minecart and zip-line challenges, and much more.

editorialNotes.tagline: Can you build the best base?
editorialNotes.standard: It’s hard to understate Clash of Clans’ massive influence in establishing complex strategic multiplayer on mobile – we still love logging on to find that our meticulously placed and upgraded fortifications survived another onslaught.

ios.subtitle: How far can you roll the ball?

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Colourful chaos awaits in our 2016 iPhone Game of the Year. Supercell’s awesome card battler delivers excellent deck-building mechanics and fast-paced fights in a package that’s easy to understand and undeniably fun. Upgrading, unlocking and experimenting with cards gives the game endless replayability, and deciding just where to drop your heroes makes each battle distinct. But no matter how good your deck is, there’s no substitute for skill and quick thinking.
editorialNotes.short: Collect powerful cards and crush your competition.

editorialNotes.tagline: Feel the thrill of air battles

ios.subtitle: Control Mario with just a tap!

editorialNotes.standard: He's here! We're all about pulling off stylish moves with a single tap, thanks to super-simple, one-touch controls. But collecting all the pink coins? That takes skill. With tons of unlocks (including Luigi!), you’ll be playing this one long after you reach the final flagpole.
Here comes the wave! In this gorgeous open-world RPG, explore eroded landscapes, battle otherworldly creatures and unlock incredible skills.

name: World War Heroes: WW2 FPS PVP

editorialNotes.standard: With exciting events, famous characters and wild courses, Nintendo’s legendary kart-racing series burns rubber on mobile.
editorialNotes.short: Tour the world and race on tracks in cities around the globe.

editorialNotes.standard: The mobile version of this stealthy adventure truly mirrors its console and PC counterparts. Nowhere is off limits as you scale buildings, leap from heights and dash through crowded streets, all while staying stealth on the hunt for your targets.
Adventure across a modern cityscape filled with raids, dungeons and lots of monsters in this gorgeous action RPG based on the popular webtoon.

name: Grand Theft Auto V: The Manual

editorialNotes.standard: With new mini-games and real-time multiplayer duels, this fruit-slashing sequel is a cut above.

Outfit7’s beloved Talking Tom series has another winner. Everything in this endless runner pops—its adorably detailed visuals, its cool-as-ice tunes, the constant surprises in the action-packed environments. Getting to play as Tom’s fuzzy friends just cranks up the fun even higher.

Daredevil. Storm. Juggernaut. Vision. Kabam’s beautiful brawler gives you control of dozens of beloved heroes and villains as you punch, kick and blast your way across the Marvel universe. A simple and intuitive set of attacks, counters and special attacks make for edge-of-your-seat combat, but you’ll spend just as much time finding and upgrading your super-team. Figuring out the best way to use them is key to surviving bouts with relentless opponents—and progressing through treacherous story quests.

ios.subtitle: Find or be found. Up to you!
Choose a Pokémon and team up!

editorialNotes.standard: Parry chain saws and battle brutes in this updated take on the horror classic that looks scary good on compatible devices.
